title: Apple Watch Series 9 Rumored to Have New Pink Color Option
content:
The upcoming Apple Watch Series 9 will feature the same design as the Series 8, but a new pink color option will be available for the aluminum model, according to info shared today by a previously-accurate leaker known as ShrimpApplePro.


Pink would be a fifth color option for the aluminum Series 9 alongside the existing Midnight, Starlight, Silver, and (PRODUCT)RED finishes, the leaker said. Apple already offers a pink finish for a few other devices, such as the latest iPad Air, iPad mini, iPad, and iMac, and the iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus are also rumored to be available in pink.

More details to followâ€¦
